Package de.nava.informa.impl.hibernate

Provides an implementation of the core news channel interfaces using persistence mechanism provided by Hibernate (for more see http://www.hibernate.org.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Category Hibernate implementation of the CategoryIF interface.
Channel Hibernate implementation of the ChannelIF interface.
ChannelBuilder Factory for the creation of the channel object model with the hibernate persistent store.
ChannelGroup Hibernate implementation of the ChannelGroupIF interface.
ChannelSubscription Hibernate implementation of the ChannelSubscriptionIF interface.
ChannelUpdatePeriodUserType  
Cloud Hibernate implementation of the CloudIF interface.
Image Hibernate implementation of the ImageIF interface.
Item Hibernate implementation of the ItemIF interface.
ItemEnclosure Hibernate implementation of the ItemSourceIF interface.
ItemGuid Hibernate implementation of the ItemGuidIF interface.
ItemMetadata Hibernate implementation of the ItemMetadataIF interface.
ItemSource Hibernate implementation of the ItemSourceIF interface.
SessionHandler Singleton class from which hibernate sesssions may be retrieved needed for transactions.
TextInput Hibernate implementation of the TextInputIF interface.
 

Package de.nava.informa.impl.hibernate Description

Provides an implementation of the core news channel interfaces using persistence mechanism provided by Hibernate (for more see http://www.hibernate.org.

For further information please consult the documentation of the package de.nava.informa.core.
